detail_desc: Top in soft, ribbed cotton jersey with short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.

department_name: Denim wardrobe H&M man inactive from S.6
detail_desc: Suit trousers in a textured stretch weave with an extended waistband, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette. For matching jacket, search on 0504415.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps.
Imitation leather sandals. Straps with adjustable fasteners and soft, moulded rubber soles.
Popover jacket in woven fabric with a drawstring hood and zip at the top. Large front pocket with a concealed zip, and elastication at the cuffs. Mesh lining.
Fitted T-shirt in ribbed jersey made from a silk and viscose blend with a round neck and short sleeves.
Knee-high boots in imitation suede with a slit at the top and a zip at the bottom of one side. Faux fur linings and insoles, and chunky soles. Heel 4.5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs.
Soft toy in velour with a removable dress with a hook and loop fastener at the back. Polyester filling. Height 25 cm.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top with a slightly wider neckline. Shorts with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in an airy, slub cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, long sleeves with a tab and button, buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Short dress in soft slub jersey made from a cotton and modal blend with a V-neck. Narrow elastication and a detachable tie belt at the waist, and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Unlined.
5-pocket corduroy trousers with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a button.
Fabric mules with a frill at the front decorated with plastic beads. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 2 cm.
Trousers in soft, patterned jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, decorative drawstring and narrow frill trim at the top. Pockets in the side seams and one back pocket.
Knee-length dress in an airy, textured chiffon weave with a flounce-trimmed V-neck and short, flounced sleeves. Seam at the waist with concealed elastication and a flared, gathered skirt. Lined.
One-shoulder top in cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a zip at the back, a gathered seam and satin tie belt at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.
High-waisted jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.

Calf-length dress in woven fabric. Wide fit with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and short puff sleeves with narrow cuffs. Seam at the waist and a flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Cap in cotton twill with an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Polo-neck collar knitted in a wool and cashmere blend with wide ribbed sections at the shoulders and a hood with a narrow ribbed trim.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a partially reflective print on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted top in viscose jersey with long sleeves and a visible seam down the front. Slightly shorter front with a knot detail at the hem.
Calf-length dress in a softly draping weave with a V-neck, concealed fastening at the front, short cap sleeves and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Base layer top in fast-drying, jacquard-patterned, functional fabric with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Seamless.
Boots in imitation patent leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a loop at the back and a zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles, and patterned soles.
Wide trousers in a patterned, softly draping viscose weave with concealed pockets in the side seams and a high waist with wide, covered elastication.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with half-length puff sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in soft, washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, back pocket and low crotch. Tapered legs with decorative stitching on the knees and ribbed hems.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in airy, plumeti chiffon with smocking and elastication at the top, 3/4-length flounced sleeves and a smocked hem. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, textured-knit with a jacquard pattern. Long raglan sleeves, buttons at the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a soft viscose weave with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Short-sleeved shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, open chest pocket and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Short dress in a fine knit containing glittery threads with a V-neck, long, trumpet sleeves and a flare to the hem.
Ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a sculpting effect on the tummy, hips and legs. Flatlock seams and a high waist with a wide waist panel.

Tunic in an airy, patterned weave with a round neck and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill trim at the cuffs. Seam under the bust. Partly lined.
Straight-cut dress in a viscose weave with a boat neck and short, open sleeves with ties. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation patent leather with rounded toes, covered block heels and a zip in one side. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short jacket in a cashmere blend with a brushed finish. Small stand-up collar, a V-shaped opening at the top with a concealed press-stud, and concealed pockets in the side seams. Straight cut with gentle draping. Unlined.

Small shoulder bag in sturdy imitation suede and imitation leather. Metal chain in the shoulder strap, a flap with a magnetic fastener, one inner compartment and one outer compartment. Lined. Size 5x13x18 cm.
Short skirt in stretch cotton twill with contrasting colour seams. Side pockets, back pockets and a visible button fly.
All-in-one pyjamas in soft jersey with long sleeves, and press-studs down the front and along one leg. The cotton content of the pyjamas is organic.
Longjohns in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Short-sleeved jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck at the front and buttons at the top. Seam under the bust and at the waist and wide, straight, ankle-length legs. Unlined.

Short-sleeved boiler suit in cotton twill with notch lapels and concealed buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets, a seam at the waist with a soft tie belt, front pockets and gently tapered legs with covered elastication at the hems.

Calf-length dress in an airy cotton weave with a linen feel. V-neck, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps, and a fitted bodice with a concealed zip at the back and hook-and-eye fastener at the top. Gathered seam at the waist with an inset, hole-embroidered trim and a flared skirt with pin-tucks and inset, hole-embroidered trims. Lined in a soft cotton weave.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Block-coloured swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Fancy dress costume in soft velour. Hood with embroidered details and appliqués, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Short, flared skirt in a stretch knit with a high waist with concealed elastication, and a pointelle section and scalloped trim at the hem. Unlined.
Cargo trousers in a linen and cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist and fake fly. Side pockets, flap welt back pockets and flap leg pockets.

Sleeveless sports top in ribbed jersey with a deep neckline and racer back. Integral sports bra with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and an elasticated hem. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Shorts in patterned cotton poplin with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.

Set with a dress and leggings in cotton. Shirt dress in soft, patterned denim with buttons down the front, a seam at the waist, front pockets, a flared skirt and long sleeves with a button at the cuffs. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Chinos in cotton twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a fake back pocket with a button and slim legs.

Trousers in cotton twill with elastication at the back of the waist, a drawstring at the front and button fly. Side pockets, back pockets and leg pockets with a flap and press-stud and shaping seams at the knees.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.

Calf-length dress in a viscose jacquard weave with a V-neck and wrapover front with a hook-and-eye fastener. Long sleeves with gathers and narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a seam at the waist with two concealed press-studs and a narrow tie at one side. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, a seam centre back and raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Metal earrings decorated with sparkly stones. Length 10 cm.
Top in soft jersey with sequined embroidery on the front and short cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Necklace with four metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant. Adjustable length.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Small toys in luminescent plastic in various sizes and designs. Size approx. 3x5 cm.
Thong briefs in ribbed cotton jersey with a high, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and string back.
Dress in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with a round neck, picot-trimmed puff sleeves and a sewn-in bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Short hooded top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, ribbed cuffs and a drawstring at the hem. Soft brushed inside.
Wide jumper knitted in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed turtle neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a print motif and a gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a small, sewn-on fabric label at the hem and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of chino shorts in cotton. Jersey T-shirt with a print motif on the front. Shorts in woven fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, a fake fly and diagonal side pockets.
Slippers in patterned satin. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front and side pockets. Ribbed cuffs and a seam at the hem with flounce.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
